about_the_game:
Dungeon Digger is a roguelike game about the adventures of a brave dwarf in search of legendary treasures. Descend to the deepest levels of the underground realm, mining increasingly valuable minerals to craft superior equipment. Battle dangerous spiders, golems, underground worms, and ghosts, and become the hero of these dark caves!



Key Features:

  • Deep Exploration:

    Venture into the deepest parts of the underground kingdom, uncovering hidden treasures and rare minerals.

  • Crafting System:

    Mine valuable resources to craft and upgrade your gear, enhancing your abilities to survive and conquer tougher challenges.

  • Challenging Enemies:

    Face off against a variety of formidable foes, including spiders, golems, worms, and ghosts, each with unique strengths and weaknesses.

  • Heroic Journey:

    Embark on a heroic quest to become the legend of the dark caves, mastering the art of dungeon digging and treasure hunting.
detailed_description:
Feature List


About the Game



Dungeon Digger is a roguelike game about the adventures of a brave dwarf in search of legendary treasures. Descend to the deepest levels of the underground realm, mining increasingly valuable minerals to craft superior equipment. Battle dangerous spiders, golems, underground worms, and ghosts, and become the hero of these dark caves!



Key Features:

  • Deep Exploration:

    Venture into the deepest parts of the underground kingdom, uncovering hidden treasures and rare minerals.

  • Crafting System:

    Mine valuable resources to craft and upgrade your gear, enhancing your abilities to survive and conquer tougher challenges.

  • Challenging Enemies:

    Face off against a variety of formidable foes, including spiders, golems, worms, and ghosts, each with unique strengths and weaknesses.

  • Heroic Journey:

    Embark on a heroic quest to become the legend of the dark caves, mastering the art of dungeon digging and treasure hunting.
name: Dungeon Digger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 175 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 175 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Dungeon Digger is a roguelike game about a brave dwarf seeking legendary treasures. Descend deep underground, mine valuable minerals, craft upgraded gear, and battle spiders, golems, worms, and ghosts to become a cave hero!
